meanings.definition: A person or thing that empties something.
meanings.sent1: The emptiers collected the trash from the bins.
meanings.sent2: The janitor and the garbage truck are both emptiers.
meanings.sent3: The little robot emptiers danced around the room, tidying up.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like music, a sweet sound that acted as an emptiers of sadness.
meanings.sent5: The image of the emptiers diligently working stayed in his mind.

meanings.sent1: The emptiers bins were all lined up neatly.
meanings.sent2: She preferred the emptiers bottles for her art project.
meanings.sent3: The emptiers shelves were filled with colorful items.
meanings.sent4: The emptiers containers stood out among the clutter.
meanings.sent5: The emptiers bags were stacked in the corner of the room.
